Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/libunistring/libunistring-1.1.tar.xz
ğŸš echo 827c1eb9cb6e7c738b171745dac0888aa58c5924df2e59239318383de0729b98  libunistring-1.1.tar.xz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf libunistring-1.1.tar.xz
ğŸš cd libunistring-1.1
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/libunistring-1.1 --disable-static --docdir=/opt/package/libunistring-1.1/share/doc/libunistring-1.1
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
